advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Lanyrd.com makes it easier to find professional events and conferences. See events your Twitter contacts are attending & speaking at. Create a profile of events you've spoken at. Catch up on slides & videos from events you've attended or missed.

Lanyrd for iOS helps you get more out of events while you're there. It stores information about conferences you're attending directly on your device - so even when there's no wifi you can see the conference schedule, attendee & speaker directories.

Features:

* Find events your Twitter Contacts are interested in.
    Sign in with Twitter and we'll show you events your contacts are going to, speaking at or interested in.

* Save events offline
    Events you mark as attending will automatically be saved to your device; if you don't have access to the internet, you can still see crucial information.

* Schedule
    Never miss a session, have the the schedule for the event in your pocket. Impress your friends with your knowledge of what's going on.

* Location
    Don't get lost before you even get there! Find the event (and the all important after party) using our maps.

* Speaker directory
    See which speakers will be at the event, see which sessions they’ll be speaking in.

* Attendee directory
    Check who is going to be at the event, find people to meet up with.

* Find the correct event hashtag
    Never use the wrong hashtag again, check the Event listing on the Lanyrd app to see the official hashtag and Twitter account of the event.

* Connect with Twitter
    Connect with attendees you have just met, or catch up with contacts you want to chat to. Find people to follow on Twitter and follow from within the app.

* Multiple Twitter account functionality
    If you’re representing your company, use the multiple account function to make sure you don’t miss out on a networking opportunity. (iOS5 only)

* See your upcoming event plans
    Easily navigate to the events you have coming up, plan your professional-social-life.

* Search for specific events
    Use Search to find an event you are looking for, and save it offline for later. You don't even have to sign in with Twitter to do this.

* See Popular events on today
    Observe the pulse of the world of professional events

* Syncs automatically with your existing Lanyrd.com account
    Build up a profile online of events you have attended and spoken at. Use the website to catch up on slides and video from events you missed.
